author: Rebecca Falconer
title: Trump and Mamdani to meet at the White House on Friday - Axios
description: Trump again referred to the democratic socialist as a "Communist" in his announcement of their meeting.
content:
• Trump again incorrectly referred to Mamdani as a "Communist" in his Truth Social announcement Wednesday night.
